components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Iliad Network in Italy

incident_updates.body: We are observing recovery in SMS delivery delays when sending messages to Iliad network in Italy. We will continue monitoring the service to ensure a full recovery. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays to Iliad network in Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays to Iliad network in Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 16 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays to Iliad network in Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays to Iliad network in Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 8 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays to Iliad network in Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 4 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We continue experiencing SMS delivery delays to Iliad network in Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

We are experiencing SMS delivery delays to Iliad network in Italy. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 1 hour or as soon as more information becomes available.

We've become aware of a potential issue with SMS delivery to Iliad network in Italy. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incidents.name: Intermittent Issues With Sender Id Retrieval

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to investigate this issue.

We are investigating delivery issues to countries requiring sender-id pre-registrations. Very small fraction of messages might fail with error 21612. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United Arab Emirates Voice Carrier Maintenance - Etisalat

incident_updates.body: The Etisalat network in United Arab Emirates is conducting a planned maintenance from 02 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 02 September 2024 at 19:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent call disconnects or call failures from and to Etisalat United Arab Emirates handsets.

scheduled_maintenances.name: Russia SMS Carrier Maintenance - Tele2

incident_updates.body:
The Tele2 network in Russia is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 30 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Tele2 Russia handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

03 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 03 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
09 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 09 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
11 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 11 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
16 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 16 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
18 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 18 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
23 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 23 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
25 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 25 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT
30 September 2024 at 13:00 PDT until 30 September 2024 at 17:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: TaskRouter Scheduled Maintenance Notice

incident_updates.body:
Maintenance Details: We will be performing a brief TaskRouter database update in the US1 region, specifically adding new columns to a table. This update is expected to be completed in less than a minute and should not affect your service.

Monitoring: Our team will closely watch the system's performance during and after the update to ensure everything runs smoothly.
Contingency Plan: In the unlikely event of any issues, we are prepared to revert the changes immediately.

scheduled_maintenances.name: United States MMS Carrier Partner Maintenance

incident_updates.body:
Our MMS carrier partner in the United States is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 03 September 2024 at 23:00 PDT until 04 September 2024 at 06:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering MMS to and from T-Mobile United States handsets via subset of United States long codes.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

04 September 2024 at 23:00 PDT until 05 September 2024 at 06:00 PDT

scheduled_maintenances.name: Planned Maintenance for Flex Insights Historical Reporting

incident_updates.body: We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

The Flex Insights Historical Reporting dashboards visualisation partner in the US is conducting planned maintenance on Saturday, September 7th, 2024, at 1:00 AM Pacific Standard Time. The maintenance window is planned to take up to 2 hours. During the maintenance window, Insights Historical Dashboards will be unavailable, and any scheduled ETLs will be affected.
